name: Robin White
text: DO NOT BUY FROM HERE!!!!  We traded a nice Jeep for a truck. We didn’t even make it home before the transmission went out. When we got home my husband contacted them and they said to bring the truck to them and they would fix the transmission. However, we didn’t have the $400 to get it towed and they said we couldn’t drive it to them. So they eventually said that they would help pay for us to get the transmission fixed elsewhere. Needless to say they completely deny that they said that. They have done nothing but lie to us and it was hard for my husband to even get them to talk to us to begin with. I REPEAT DO NOT BUY FROM THEM!!!! If they would’ve done as they said we wouldn’t be leaving bad reviews!! If I could give a lower star rating I would.

resp.text: So sorry you feel this way, never did we offer to pay for the vehicle to be fixed elsewhere.  I can post the messages between your husband and us.  We traded "as is" I never complained about what I had to fix on the Jeep nor would I had said anything had you brought the transmission to us to have an opportunity to make you happy.  But to get on here and tell absolute "Lies" is slanderous to say the least.  I have read every word of our conversations and I suggest you do the same, that way you can get the facts straight.  As i quote the last thing he said " i am going to dump on you"/

name: Doug White
text:
DO NOT BUY FROM ACTION AUTO WHOLESALE LLC

Transmission went out before I could even get home, after they told me it was just rebuilt. I made sure because it the 4060 in a 2000 GMC SIERRA 4x4, which if you know about that transmission you know they are known for going out. Anyway the only way they will help is if I tow it to a guy that they use, which works at the city dump. The same guy who supposedly rebuilt it already. Well I live over a hour away and to tow it there would cost $400. So I called to get them to pay for the tow but no they wouldn't do that. I don't have $400 to tow it out there, you see I traded a very nice Jeep Wrangler for the truck. So I found a shop to rebuild the transmission for a $1,000 and ask Action Auto Wholesale to pitch in half. You guessed it they are not willing to help me in anyway. DON'T BUY FROM ACTION AUTO WHOLESALE LLC
LOCATE AT 34382 US-98, Lillian,Alabama 36549

DO NOT BUY FROM ACTION AUTO WHOLESALE LLC

text: Drove thirty miles to buy a car the truck was rough I was still willing to buy the truck but he was unwilling to come down on price.

resp.text: Mr Coker, I am glad you drove in and looked at our truck. I hate that the condition was not to your liking, but we price our vehicles per condition so all discounts are already given with advertised price. I keep many pictures on the website and try to be very forthcoming with any imperfections. I hate wasting peoples time just as much as I hate my time being wasted. Just because you were not willing to pay the advertised price that you drove over for, should not justify a one star review.  I hate that we did not see eye to eye. I still cannot see the justification in a 1- Star review. Thank you, BJ.

She even did quite a bit of preliminary leg work on letting us know if a trade was possible (it was, and very fair, in our opinion).

name: Chandrya Alvis
text:
Hello, I’m a 21 year old 1st time buyer , I feel as if they played me about my warranty, my car & my overall sale. when I first got the car on June 18,2020
I needed a oil change badly!! The car had 0% oil life! Once I did that I needed a new water pump , Also I soon discovered  my 2014 Chevy Cruze had a oil leak as well..
then the thermostat went out , I had to replace the battery all out these things came of my pocket with in 2 months of having the car
also while maintaining my car note and car insurance I’ve never been late or missed any payments due to the fact I work to pay these bills. I’ve only had the car 5 months and here goes the motor just gone out..

when we recall all the problems this car had and I was fixing it every time something happen the mechanic and I agreed that it’s been a problem with the motor he also told me Chevy Cruze’s had a recall on their motor!!
The dealership never told me this! The mechanic did , now here iam 2 week later without a car , a rental , no communication from the dealership or warranty company just nothing I’m paying to get my car looked at  I’m missing work and I have to do everything alone every time I call GENE HE TELLS ME TO CALL TROY!! Finally I called TROY just wanting to get help with my car getting fixed by this 2 year warranty i supposed to have  because once I sent it to real good mechanic they told him I didn’t have a warranty!! That  I was supposed to have & they don’t know anything!! I had to find the warranty number alone and when I get Troy on the phone he’s “sick with COVID-19” so I guess that means hang up in my face because he’s not feeling well BUT NEITHER AM I!! I’m a 21 year old women who pays her bills on time and have to get to work!!  I really need my car due to me having two jobs and was responsible for getting myself to work. I feel like I bought a lemon!! Well proofs in the pudding my advice to upcoming buyers... TAKE A MECHANIC AND LET HIM TEST DRIVE IT !! It’s only one person at Langston motors that tried to help me during this process and that’s Troy daughters she’s a angle and I thank you so Much for trying to do what you can to help me!!! I really appreciate you the most!! Thanks for everything!

Sincerely, A angry black women.

name: Patricia Seymour
text: Love Gulf Coast Auto Group staff.  It’s the Audi that’s the problem.  I only have approximately 46K miles on the car.  She’s pretty.  But the convertible top has leaked since the purchase.  Then there have been so many problems with other parts, and a 3x AC problem/fix (qualifying it as a lemon), that it has been in the shop as much as it’s been with me.  I have a color-coded chart. When I let the “powers that be” at Audi know about the first few years of problems, they basically said, “FU with a smile”.  This car was actually built in Germany.  My German friends would be appalled.  They take their car quality very seriously.

name: Emily
text: I had a great experience purchasing my new car from Gulf Coast Auto Group. I highly recommend Mr. Kenny Cunningham. He was professional, honest, friendly, and made my buying experience easy and fast. All of the staff I spoke with were friendly and professional. I will use them in the future.

name: Ellie M
text: My service representative, Laura Collier, is wonderful! She always ensures that every issue is resolved. We have been extremely satisfied with the service that she and the mechanics at Audi of Mobile have provided to us over the past 5 years with our two Audis. My son took his Audi to another local repair shop and they caused damage to the vehicle because they lacked the knowledge and skills to properly perform the repairs. We then took his car to Audi of Mobile and they corrected everything! I will ONLY have my Audi Q5 serviced at Audi of Mobile.

name: Makenzie Brenner
text: I admit I was nervous to purchase a car online from a dealership over 6 hours away, but Gulf Coast Auto, specifically Devon made the experience seamless. Great communication, fantastic customer service and product knowledge. It was honestly the best experience I could’ve hoped for. 100% worth the road trip down and I am obsessed with my new car!

name: Queen Royalty
text: Everyone there is so nice and helpful. The finance department and the sales person (Alfredo Montes) made sure we understood the offer for our Volkswagen Atlas.

name: Myra C.
text: I went to Porsche of New Orleans and they were trying to blantantly make the 2018 Macan I wanted inaccessible. These fools really tried to make me put down 20,000 for a 500/month car payment. AVOID THAT DEALERSHIP AT ALL COST. They did not want to sell to a African American woman. Anyways, I found 2 more 2018 Macans in the Mobile area the same evening so we decided to go the next day. BEST DECISION EVER! I traded in my 2014 Infiniti Q60S that I loved dearly for a 2018 Porsche Macan! As a traveling CVOR tech, I needed more space and Kendarrius ensured that I didn’t leave without the vehicle that I wanted! I literally pulled up at 12:15 and was driving off at 4:30!! That was crazy fast, but if you are looking for an amazing deal on a beautiful car, THIS is the place to go. My monthly payment is 585/month on a PORSCHE!! That’s unheard of! They knew I wanted the car and this dealership made sure I left in it without having to eat bread and water for the next couple of years!

name: Monica Mingo
text:
My last two vehicles were Land Rovers.  I narrowed this purchase to an Audi or a Land Rover.  Devon took me on my test drives after donning a mask and I left with total knowledge of the Q5.  I went to the Land Rover dealership and was left knowing the same about their vehicles as I already knew upon arrival.  I was also unhappy with the attitude once I requested the salesman wear a mask during the test drive.

I called Devon the next morning to let him know that my husband and I would be returning and, when we got there, Devon was ready to go.  This young man has received several awards and accolades based on his performance and knowledge of Audi vehicles. I noticed two certifications on his desk.

Headed there my husband told me we were not going to buy the vehicle today and that this was simply an exploratory mission and that he wanted to test drive and then get the information in order to make a thoughtful decision.  After speaking with Devon at length, we ended up buying the Q5 same day.

Devon simply makes you feel good.  You sense his honesty right up front and there were no questions he couldn't answer.  We truly felt we were in extremely competant hands.

Thank you to Devon, the auto group, and for making it easy to jump the Land Rover ship and become a member of the Audi family.

name: Keri Van Atta
text: Alfredo Montes was very helpful and nice. We ended up not being able to afford the car we wanted, but he never made us feel bad or embarrassed. And most importantly he didn't make us feel like we wasted his time. He went above and beyond for us and I really appreciate it! Thanks Alfredo!!😊😊😊

name: Lee Lee
text: Courtney was so accommodating & super nice. Thanks Courtney- appreciate!

name: Daniel Flores
text: Purchased a VW all over the phone with Doug Klezmer. Doug took great care of me with a very smooth and convenient purchase. Very happy all the way around. Wish all car purchases were this easy! Thanks, Doug!

name: Michele
text: Me and my husband have had so many bad experiences here before the name change and new management or whatever. We always made appointments and would be there for 3 or 4 hours, we hated going there and the customer service was horrible! Today was the first time we've been there in at least a year or more and we were amazed at how much more better it is now. Our appointment was at 1 and we were out in less than an hour. Sean took great care of us and kept updated about what was going on with our car! The customer service was AMAZING! We have never experienced such great service like we did today. Thank you so much Laura and Sean and everyone for such a great experience and service we received today from you all!

name: Wayne Douglas
text: This dealership is very deceptive and dishonest. My salesperson was Alfredo. I specifically asked them to run my credit only through VW and stated that on the credit application. I found out a few days later that they had run it through all 3 credit bureaus instead and when I confronted Alfredo about it he said that that is just the way they do business and that my credit won't be hurt if I buy a car from them. My credit score dropped 24 points because of their unethical sales tactics. Most car manufacturers have their on inhouse financial arm so when you run your credit directly through them you only take an 8 point hit so that's why I made the specific request. Because I value my credit score so much it is very high and now I am reluctant to have it run at another dealership to get the car I want because of Alfredo and his companies dishonesty. This is just the worst fo many misleading statements Alfredo made to me. You're better off driving to one of the surrounding cities to buy your next vehicle than from here.

name: Krista Blanton-Goguen
text:
We recently bought our first Volvo. AJ has gone out of his way to make this experience as seamless as possible. His knowledge about the car far surpasses any other dealership we have worked with.
The vehicle is amazing and capable of so many things.  Each time the technology out smarts me he is always available to answer my text or phone call and walk me through it.
I just appreciate the extra effort he always goes to to make us feel valuable. I love my Volvo and don’t plan on going anywhere else for my future vehicles.

name: Robert Sanders
text: Had a wonderful experience from my first contact to walking out the door. Zach was great and took care of my wife and I. Recommended this place to everyone since buying a car and will go back for our next vehicle.

name: Patrick Isbell
text: My wife recently purchased a used 16 Beatle convertible that was a recent lease turn in. Devon was an awesome salesman and made us feel like family during the entire experience. I believe we got a quality vehicle and a reasonable price. I know she will be thinking of her buying experience and the welcoming employees whenever she drops the top this summer!

name: Edward Thomas
text: Gulf Coast Auto Group should change their name again, because of one simple question- do you give military discounts? No one in the service department knew or was unwilling to give at least 10% off. The parts department gave 10% off for military when I purchased 4 spark plug not less than 15 minutes laters. Military service people active and retired I will inform you don't buy anything from there without a discount 10% or higher, & at this point it should be higher.

name: june newton
text:
THIS THE PLACE!!
Considering a new car, this is the place! My husband and I bought 12 cars in our lifetime - this experience was by far the most professional/personable buying experience. The consultant, Santwan, was knowledgeable beyond measure, unlike the run-of-the-mil hunting salesman. The entire experience, from consultant, to floor manager [John], to Finance [Danny], to the GM [Mark].  Wow, treatment like the customer is a REAL PERSON not just a customer buying one of their cars - really, they have hearts and personality? We couldn't believe the care and the detail in service.  You go Gulf Coast Auto Group!!

resp.text:
Hi Ms. Newton, thank you so much for the kind words! We are thrilled that Santwan, John, Danny and Marc are an integral part of our team. We are so humbled that you chose Gulf Coast Auto Group!

Ashley Allen
Business Development Director

name: Elizabeth Millette
text: I recommmed this dealership to anyone. They made the car buying process easy! We first contacted Melissa from their online sales department. She was always quick to respond and answer our questions about a specific car, but never pushy or bothersome. When we were ready, she set us up an appointment to come in to the dealership. From that point we worked with Brittany Smith! She was a pleasure to do business with. Brittany was very friendly, knowledgeable and never made us feel rushed or pressured. We couldn’t be happier with our new car and the service we received at Gulf Coast Auto Group.

resp.text:
Hi Elizabeth, we are so happy you’re loving your new vehicle! Brittany and Melissa are key members to our sales team, and we are lucky to have them! I’ll pass your kind words on to them and our management staff Monday morning! Thanks again for giving us the opportunity to earn your business and we look forward to serving you!

Ashley D. Allen
Business Development Director

name: Chris Mayfield
text: These guys were amazing. They knew I wanted the car, and got the price and interest down to what I could afford. I would highly recommend this dealer.

resp.text: Thank you Chris! We appreciate your business and congrats on your new car!

name: Christian
text: I had an awesome experience with Gulf Coast Auto Group, after 7 months of searching for the right car and having poor experiences with other dealers across the nation as I live in Colorado, I was thrilled with my experience here. Santwan Wiley is the MAN. If you guys are looking for an excellent client advisor who will do everything in your best interest in helping you get into an awesome vehicle, he is your guy. I appreciate all the effort the team put in and his effort in to making sure that car was mine. I did not feel pressured at all and this was by the far the bestcar buying experience that I have had. I Cannot wait to get down there and take receipt of my new 2015 BMW X5! Thanks guys for an awesome experience!!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Christian.

name: Carly Martinez
text: thanks to mr devon for helping me buy my first car!

name: Becky Dunn
text: The is the best car dealer i have ever dealt with and mr. Paul Stanley is the best to deal with!! He will treat you right i love my Volkswagen !!!

name: Anthony Cook
text:
I leased a 2018 Volkswagen Jetta from this dealership on June the 27th. It is now August  6th and I have yet to get my tag paperwork. I had to call the bank to get my old car loan extended so my old car loan would not go in collections. Not only that shortly after I leased I noticed a small ding on my hood. I went to the dealership to see what they could do and they said it would be no problem to fix. It has now been over a month I haven't received a call or a text. I know the dealership has recently changed owners, but the management at this establishment really dropped the ball. My family will no longer purchase or lease any vehicles from this dealership.

I did try to call you. I left a message and no response. Why would I have expected anything different.

resp.text: Anthony- I sincerely apologize for this inconvenience. We expect exceptional customer service, and we regret that we missed that mark. My name is Ashley Allen and I am the Business Development Director here at Gulf Coast Auto Group. Please call me directly at 251.301.0013 so we can get you what you need asap.

name: Michael Kolbe
text: Thanks Devon! Great experience and a perfect vehicle!

name: Lisa Wurst
text: Stated that they did not have to follow through with what was written on my leasing contract “Since Dean sold it to us.”

name: Debra Hawk
text: Look no further, these guys have it all. At least if they don't have what you are looking for they will go find it. Literally tell them what car or SUV your looking for and Dylan will find it for you. With clean, dependable used vehicles they also have easy financing. Go see Dylan today at Southtown Motors in Hoover by Krystal's.

name: W. Washington
text: I don't write reviews, but I had too for Hoover Southtown Motors. It is by far the BEST dealership I've ever visited. From the moment my husband and I walked on the lot, God sent Dylan directly to us. He was very knowledgeable of the vehicles and very professional. We prayed that God would send us to the right place, and he did. Dylan really took the time to actually talk to us about what we was looking for in regards to the best vehicle for us. I'm so thankful God led us there. The finance manager and the other employees also made us feel welcomed. I can see this business rising to a new level. I pray it continues to grow and prosper in Jesus's name! Thank you Hoover Southtown Motors for being a business of respect, professionalism, and integrity. God Bless!

name: Eric McGuyer
text: Had a great experience at Southtown! Came to look a vehicle for our son. We were on a specific budget and they were very accommodating. They didn;t have a vehicle on they lot that fit what we were looking for, so they went out and found it for us. They delivered a no pressure expience that won them some repeat customers.

name: Kim McLeod
text: VERY SATISFIED!!! Before coming here I visited several dealerships and by far this is the best car buying experience I have ever had. Thanks Dylan! I look forward to my vehicle being delivered which they were happy to do even though I live 2 hours away! Truly awesome service and anyone you have the opportunity of crossing paths with are genuinely nice! Thanks for awesome service! They offer it all for a nice one stop shop pressure free.

resp.text:
Thank you Kim for the 5 STAR opinion of our Dealership team here in Hoover.!!! We always try to go the extra mile (or hours:)  to make sure everyone is satisfied. You are our next best customer.
Hoover SouthTown really does appreciate you taking time out of your day to give your honest opinion:)
I will make sure Dylan does know how happy you are with his service before, but most of all, after the vehicle purchase. Thank you Kim.

name: Walter Davie
text: What a find! And, I am not just talking about the great vehicle (Toyota FJ Cruiser) but the entire dealership. As soon as you walk onto the lot you get a great feeling about a reputable dealership. I met Craig right off and he was friendly, professional, and went out of his way to assist in a great car buying experience. Hoover Southtown Motors is a great place to do business with honest, customer focused staff. I will return and highly recommend to others. Thanks Craig for helping me locate and purchase a great vehicle. Excellent experience from start to finish!

resp.text: WOW!! Thank you Mr. Davis for your great 5 STAR specific review! I will let Craig know today on how happy you are  with his service on the Toyota FJ Cruiser. Our whole TEAM appreciates you.

name: Lawanda Brown
text: My husband and I have been looking to buy a Hyundai Equus for a few years. We found the dealership by the name Hoover Southtown Motor.. We had a great salesman Mr. Craig Robert. Thank You so much for finding my husband Gary dream Car ...I will tell anyone they are the best dealership to buy a car from.

name: Jerred Norris
text: Had a great experience with Dylan Freeman. I was working two full time jobs and didn’t have a lot of time to be really interactive and involved. I told him the truck I wanted, what I’d like to see in regards to financing, and what I had as a down payment, and he nailed it. I couldn’t make it to the dealership at the open time, and he stayed an hour pass closing to get me going. It’s always awesome to have someone work with you in situations like that, and he did.

resp.text: Hey Jerred. ..Thank you so much for the  5 STAR  detailed review on how we could help with the truck purchase   !

name: nicole turner
text: I bought a car from David Cooper 21 years ago and it’s been a continued pleasure over the years to know him. I recently bought another car and worked with Will Rowell along side of David. For the second time, I got a fabulous car at a fabulous price! David and Will are both conscientious, accommodating and the absolute opposite of pushy. If you’re in the market for a great car, these two are the ones you should call

name: Matthew Mizzell
text: BIG FAN OF SOUTHTOWN! Found a car for my wife online that I knew was a good deal based on my research. I had no prior dealings with Hoover Southtown but called ahead and spoke with Dylan who told me he would have it ready for me. When I arrived the car was out front full display mode. I got to know Dylan and learn the Southtown story and I’m glad I did. Southtown is a great local family run dealership that has been in our community for approximately 30 years. They are knowledgeable, helpful and honest. The car turned out to be everything I hoped it was and Dylan was able to give me a really fair price on the trade in also. I walked away with a great new car for my wife at a better net price than I thought was possible when I walked in. I also got to learn about their service discount for customers and took full advantage of it for another vehicle I have that needed body work. Another place had quoted me nearly $1,500 for that body work to replace things that were easily repaired by Southtown instead. Turns out no replacement needed. They fixed it up so quick they didn’t even charge me. I highly recommend this place, as well as Dylan. I’ll be back and finally feel like I have a go to car place now. Truly one of the best kept secrets in the community in terms of a quality car dealership.

resp.text:
Thank you Matthew for such a super detailed review on your auto purchase at HOOVER Southtown Motors. I will let Dylan know how happy you were with his personal follow all the way through detail.
We appreciate you.  Don't keep us a local community secret :)

name: zech 823
text: Best Customer Service by far. Staff is very friendly and eager to help. Dylan our salesman was very knowledgeable and honest with us about the vehicles and was able to help us find a car for my daughter. The whole process was so easy. Oh and the bonuses that come along with purchasing is amazing.

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate you taking time out of your day to thank Dylan & for representing our auto business so well ! We train every employee to treat everyone as family during this important purchase. THANK YOU !

name: Jalen Hunter
text: Gotta love Southtown Motors!!!! I believe this is my 3rd car purchased from them—great experience each and every time. This is a dealership with family values and honest intentions. Craig is a kind heart and goes over and beyond for his customers; Jason is a jovial spirit, honest, and means well for all who come and take a seat at his desk, and Jeff is the man of it all—takes in great inventory, executes excellent customer service. Awesome team! Awesome company! Go by and give them a visit!!!

name: Lauren M. Harris
text: Great experience! I knew what car I was looking for but could not find anything I wanted locally or within a 250+ mile radius.  I told Jason and Will all the specifications that I was looking for and they made every effort to get a vehicle matching what I wanted and to get me the best interest rate.  Will was great to work with and kept us updated every step of the way until the vehicle was delivered, cleaned and ready to be picked up. Would highly recommend buying from Hoover Southtown Motors.  Could not have asked for an easier car buying experience!

name: Hunter Munholland
text: Will definitely buy from again the next time I need a vehicle. Great service with experience. When I couldn’t get approved at other places I went, not only did they get me approved, but at a much lower interest rate.

resp.text: Thank you Hunter for the 5 STAR service appreciation, and I will let our financing department know how you appreciated their local help..

name: Rachel D
text: Great customer service! After searching for the perfect car for weeks we came here and Dylan helped us get the car I wanted. Thanks again!

resp.text: Thank you Rachel.! I will make sure our team knows how you appreciated Dylan, ALL of or staff , & customer services. Thank you!

name: Kristi Hashtag
text: This place was absolutely amazing! They went above and beyond to help us in every way so that we could put our daughter in the perfect car for her sweet 16th birthday! My husband and I both plan on purchasing new vehicles this year and will definitely be returning to Southtown to do so! More than HIGHLY recommended!

name: David Fuino
text: I have been looking for this truck for almost a year and a half. When I requested via the website if the vehicle was still available, Dylan called me within five minutes. We went down to take a look at everything, and every person at that company we came in contact with had a bright smile and was extremely friendly. The purchase process was super easy, and everyone was very informative of any question that we asked. I will absolutely recommend my friends and family to come here for their next vehicles.

name: Laura Davis
text: Craig and J were awesome! I knew what I wanted in my next vehicle, they pulled up a list, and within a week’s time MY DREAM CAR was here! I can’t believe how nice this thing is. They went above and beyond to help me get exactly what I was looking for and made sure I was completely happy with it. Would absolutely recommend again and again!

resp.text: Thank you Laura Davis for taking time out of your busy day to throw the 5 Stars up. We Would absolutely love for you to recommend again and again!

name: Keshia Syyt
text: What can I say? I was headed to Krystals but got a car instead!!!! Dylan is so nice and super helpful. He is indeed a man of his word!! I am so so happy I chose Southtown Motors. The finance Manager Jason rocks!! He was quick and accurate and answered all of my questions. I will absolutely buy from Southtown Motors again!!!! Love Love Love my new car!!!!

resp.text:
Thank you so much Keshia for writing the 5 STAR rating in your new car! Next time Krystal's are on us! We will let Dylan know you were very happy with all his help. Jason in Financing as well !
We appreciate customers letting us know how well we do for them.
Or, any other ways we can improve in the entire auto purchase!

name: Jordan Earl
text: Hoover Southtown is the best! I didn’t even know what I wanted when I came in and Craig helped me pick out the perfect vehicle. When I came back to buy the car I was in and out in less than an hour! These guys are awesome and really know what they are doing. Thank you Southtown and Craig for helping take all the stress out of the car-buying process. I will definitely be a customer for life!

name: Preston Jones
text: When I first showed up on a Sunday i was very excited about calling and getting some information on a truck. However when i arrived my salesmen had a horrible attitude and in a way told me straight up that i wouldn’t be able to afford a $40,000 truck that they had on the lot, and that they would look for something more in my price range. Was very un-pleased with the customer service. Will not be coming back!

resp.text: Preston, We appreciate the opportunity. We are a family owned business that does our best .. come see me anytime. , but we are not open Sunday’s.. :)   Thank you;)

name: Jim Doggett
text: What a breeze! No hassle, just fair and honest. Saved me thousands. Thanks Craig!

name: Sarai Garcia
text: My family and I were treated with so much love and respect from them, and literally got the car I wanted within the week of meeting them! They offer so much more then just selling cars, and I will be going back for any thing I need! They’re great!

name: Deaushay Watts
text:
Southtown Motors was excellent and provided first class customer service.

Dylan and the team gave me a fair trade in value for my car and went over and above to help find the SUV I wanted.

I highly recommend Southtown Motors.

name: Valerie Johnson
text: Hey everyone!!! I want to tell you that I had THE BEST experience at Hoover Southtown Motors! Craig and Jason are the best! They were able to get me the best ride and the best rate! I walked in not expecting to drive away in my Dream truck that day! They made it happen for me and can make it happen for you! They were courteous and made sure that I was taken care of every step of the way! Your next ride should come from here! Thanks Craig and Jason for the great service!

name: Ryan Conwell
text: This place is awesome. I worked with Dylan, and he was very upfront and transparent about every step during the process. I made a mistake a few years ago and was upside down in a car, and these guys helped me get a better car and an amazing deal! Can’t  recommend enough!

name: Thomas Gallo
text: Only place I’ll buy a car from now on. Best customer service I’ve ever experienced! Be sure to ask for Dylan!

resp.text: Thomas Gallo.. we appreciate your compliments. We appreciate you

name: Thomas Whitten
text: My daughter had the pleasure of buying her first car from the sweetest, most honest, most respectful gentleman, Mr. Craig Roberts, at Hoover Southtown Motors! We also met Mr. Jason and he was such a nice man! The quick and easy process was so nice and we couldn’t have asked for better from start to finish! Thank you Hoover Southtown Motors, Mr. Craig, & Mr. Jason for being a blessing!

name: Asa Williams
text: I worked with a salesman named Dylan Freeman and he was extremely helpful and focused on helping me make the best decision for myself. I had a lot of questions and he was more than willing to answer everything I threw at him. I would recommend him to anybody I know looking for a used car.

name: Aaliyah Bell
text: I just got a car from Southtown Motors located in Hoover,Al. I had a great experience. I’m only 23 and was able to get my own car, and it was my first time. Dylan was a great help throughout the entire process. Would definitely recommend them to anybody else. Please do not get them confused with other dealerships. It’s the Southtown Motors on Montgomery Highway in Hoover, Al. They have very affordable prices for great cars!!!!!!!

name: Michael Willliams
text: I recently purchased a BMW X5 diesel from Southtown motors Hoover. I'm very happy with my purchase, and extremely pleased with this vehicle. I want to say Thank you Will, and I will buy from you again!!

resp.text: Thank you Michael , We can not thank you enough for your business. We love when customers take time out of the day to thank our team here at Hoover SouthTown.. Will Rowell will know what a Great job he did getting you your SUV, & the  wonderful experience you had here. Thank you

name: Erica Shunnarah
text: I just bought a new Lexus from Dylan at Hoover Southtown Motors. He was so helpful and willing to answer any questions we had. We are so happy with our new car and would highly recommended anyone to call Dylan.

name: Jeff Smith
text: Five Stars!  I bought an OUTSTANDING truck from Southtown Hoover, Dylan was friendly, knowledgeable, helpful above and beyond.  I got a great deal!  Highly recommend Southtown Hoover.

name: Kenneth Smith
text: Dylan was helpful and searched for what my wife and I needed. He was knowledgeable about most everything we asked and the questions he couldn't answer he took time to find the answers. I trust this business, and that says a lot about a used car business. I've been using them for over a decade.

name: Cary Lott
text: These guys do a great job. The “used car Salesmen” mantra doesn’t apply here. Some of the most professional and genuine guys in the business. Great place to go and relationships matter to Southtown.

name: Maitena Perez
text: Great experience! They were very helpful and also having a great attitude with dealing with customers. Made the process of buying so easy and know I’m in love with my new car! Would definitely go back!

name: Elizabeth Williams
text: Jeff and Craig were so easy to deal with.  They were kind and responsive. They had exactly what I was looking for at Hoover Southtown and made the switch from a Camry to an SUV very easy!!  When it came to finance, Jason was very knowledgeable and helpful. It was a great experience from every aspect!!!  Thanks guys!!!

name: Randall Vann
text:
First let me say if you’re in the market for a vehicle you shouldn’t visit any other dealer until you visit Hoover Southtown motors.
These guys are truly some of the best people that I have dealt with buying cars my entire car buying life. They went above and beyond to help us with our vehicle choice. They have a great owner that is honest and works for your business, they have a great salesman named Dylan Freeman that will go out of his way to help you pick out what you need. They do not try to pressure you in anyway.
They have a great finance person Jason that will work out the best financing options for you.
We are very pleased with our recent visit and dealings with this dealership and I truly believe you will be too. We will certainly be back when we need another.

name: Dakota Chamness
text: I went in looking for a vehicle a few months ago. I talked to Dylan and he assured me that he would find the perfect truck (price and style) for me. My credit was not great and I came in almost at closing time on New Years Eve, but Dylan and the crew were determined to help me out and get me in my new truck. 10/10 would recommend these guys and I can not wait to do business with y’all again.

name: Chris Ketrow
text: 5 STARS PLUS!! I just recently purchased one of my dream cars from them. We had a few speed bumps on my end with my bank financing but they were extremely patient. The best service I have ever received from a dealership. Ask for Craig he's a great guy. If I need another car I will definitely be going back.

name: frances fowler
text: I have bought not one but two cars at South Town Motors Hoover. Their service is absolutely amazing every time I have shown up someone has walked out and met me within three minutes of my arrival. They’re so friendly and can actually look up any car for you, even if they do not have it in stock. The person who has helped me the most is Dylan, he just so happen to know and locate both cars I have been searching for each time within 20 minutes and have them in the lot of southtown. Definitely go check them out for a pre owned vehicle and be sure to ask for Dylan!!

name: Kyle Heine
text: I worked with Dylan Freeman and was able to get the exact Jeep I've been wanting at an excellent price. The staff is willing to work with you and are highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you Kyle! We always try our best to get excellent price on any vehicle. Our Southtown Hoover family appreciates you. I’ll let Dylan know about your compliment on the Jeep purchase , and our service!

name: thenerdess
text: Awesome place and awesome selection!! Dylan and Jason helped me to get the car I wanted and made sure everything was affordable for me. If you need some new wheels, definitely check them out!

name: Angela Quick
text: Great staff, great service, and a great vehicle!   The gentlemen we dealt with went out of the way to help us get an SUV we had found online.  When we arrived, our salesperson, Craig, told us the vehicle we wanted had just came in and offered to take us offsite where it was being detailed.   Even though it was the end of his day, Craig was kind and patient and answered all of our questions.   We test drove it at the shop and knew it was exactly what we wanted.  When we came back the next day to sign paperwork the finance manager had everything ready and had found us a very low interest rate.  They were very professional and made it super easy to do business.  Everyone there was friendly and attentive and it made our car buying experience excellent. Its been a few months since our purchase and we have not had any problems with our SUV.  We will definitely buy from them again!

name: Angela Hollis
text: Didn't care much for the inventory, looked like junk. Cars were all piled in on top of each other. Couldn't get anything out to test drive without having to move 3 or more cars.

name: Ted Bridges Jr
text: I drove 220 miles to buy from Hoover Southtown Motors. I was NOT disappointed! I got exactly the kind of truck I wanted for thousands of dollars less than I was seeing elsewhere. name: Titus Crutcher

text: I recently purchased a car from David Cooper. My family has bought cars from David before and we have had a great experience. When I was in the market for a car, I was lucky that David helped find me exactly what I needed in my price range. It was a smooth process and he was very helpful. Would recommend to anyone!

name: Dan Woosley
text:
For having driven past Hoover Southtown Motors (HSTM) literally hundreds and hundreds of times over the years, we were finally drawn onto their site by a van advertised on Facebook Marketplace.  We have been exhaustively searching online and at local dealer lots for a late-model mini-van, low-mileage at a competitive price.

In doing so, we honed in on the year, make and model, as well as the accessories we wanted.  And our lengthy search also gave us a good feel for the price that the market was asking for, for a well-maintained Sienna.

So when Dylan Freeman met us on the lot to answer any questions, we were ready to dig into the details in short order.  He was much more than helpful and we immediately felt at ease as he shared his insights into this particular vehicle and how the pre-owned car market worked.  He was never pushy and gave us the space to ask honest questions we had accumulated in our research.

We opted for a fair price on our trade-in SUV and after a brief ride in the Toyota, we were coached through the loan process with Jason Grier's help.  HSTM staff were professional and respectful, friendly and helpful, and offered a quality used car for a very fair price.

Many thanks to Hoover Southtown Motors for a great find and a smooth transition into our new van.

name: C D
text: I had a really nice experience here.  I came in late one afternoon to see a vehicle and noticed as I was walking up to the door that someone else was looking at it with some paperwork in hand.  Turns out I was about an hour too late.  However, David Cooper worked with me, found out what I was looking for, what kind of budget I had, etc.  About 3 days later, he called me back to say that he thought he'd found a car that would work.  When it did come in a few days past that, it was a great looking car, a better model than the one that I'd missed out on, and they still made it fit into my budget that I'd provided.  I've now been driving that car for about just over 2 weeks and am quite pleased with the purchase and condition of the car.  I'd definitely go back to Southtown Motors if I need another vehicle.

We purchased the car and we couldn’t get the third row up because the previous owners installed leather and probably didn’t install the seats correctly. We noticed this after we purchased the vehicle. My mom was sure that it was nothing they could do because we had already signed.

THIS WAS NOT THE CASE. Dillon told us to come right back and he would take care of it for us. Also when we applied for the tag we left the packet at home. He stopped what he was doing at work and emailed the paperwork to the attendant we were working with.
They are absolutely AMAZING!!

text: I was optimistic in the beginning but unfortunately my experience ended up being the worst of any car dealership I have dealt with. Trade ins and financing went smoothly but once it came to receiving my new vehicle, I experienced the worst customer service and treatment. They agreed to fix several issues with the vehicle before I would take possession. This included fixing or replacing non working, moisture filled headlights and taillights, turn and safety sensors and a harsh noise and shake coming from the vehicle when driven. They kept my new vehicle for several weeks and it still had to be returned for failure to do all of the work and right after taking possession of the vehicle, everything they “fixed” stopped working, lights filled with moisture again and the noise returned. I paid over $30,000 for a vehicle I can not safely drive 6 months later. Buyer beware most definitely.

text: Super nice people.  Very pleased! No pressure and seem genuine. We are looking forward to years of great service!

name: Natasha Walker
text:
I have been looking for a car for 6 months. One day I, just googled the type of car I wanted and the year and car guru showed me different options. I saw the car I wanted and price was great! Therefore, I inquired about the car and encountered David Cooper. Nice person. I went down to view the car and test drive as well all went perfect. However, they should really watch what they say and how they say it. The day I went back to purchase, it was stated by David C. they found an extra key, ( that made me wonder suppose it may have went another way but, sometimes used cars come with two keys and sometimes not its gamble.) I have worked at a dealership before, and I know how sales representatives do (it is optional they can give you both sets, but they really do not have to). I over heard him say since I paid cash he is going to let me have the other key, but I didn’t say a word about it because it is what it is. When I got to the final stage and had to do paper work I forgot the young man name, but he used a very horrible analogy when he got to the repossession page. The car I purchased was decent thank god had a few issues before I left. The tire sensor would not go off come to find out there was a nail in the tire it was in there before I left Birmingham and the blend door had gotten stuck on the passenger side but they agreed to fix it. My advice to others do your background check and research and when buying a used car pay attention to small and big detail. Overall, everything else went smooth. My name will not be in your system as N. Richardson it will be listed as N. Walker.

I purchase a used vehicle from this place in February and it’s only been two months for me, but now I have to replace brakes, rotors, 2 tie rod ends, and I had to purchase a spare tire. I know the vehicle is used and all, but at least check the cars out completely before selling them. I just thank GOD those tie rods didn’t come apart on me while driving. I didn’t get to go a good test drive so I couldn’t really get the feel of the car. Overall motor wise the car is good. Guys just please check more into the vehicles used or not y’all selling cars and not thinking completely about safety. God was truely with me.

(05/06/2020)-*Just an update they did not even try to reach out to me after posting that review they don't care, just wanted to reach their quota and get a commission.

name: John Davis
text: Bought a truck there two months ago with a 3 month/3k mile warranty.  Within a few days, I realized the AC was messed up, so they replaced the AC Compressor.  A few days later, the AC was doing the same thing.  Took it back and they got it fixed, but they messed up something else in the AC system (lack of proper lubrication IMO).  They refused to fix it.  I told them the CD player was broken within a week and they said they usually don't warranty stereos, but they would look at it.  By "looking at it," they just ripped my CD out and ruined the CD without fixing anything.  Then I noticed when I was towing a trailer, something was seriously wrong.  I originally told them it was a transmission issue or engine misfire.  Long story short, they "can't find the problem" and 6 months later I'm still stuck with a broken truck.  They always acted like they were on my side, but this dealership is nothing but a group of crooks.  I dealt with everyone trying to get it straightened out.  They told me they would find another truck for me to trade out of.  They found one and it was nothing like what I wanted, so I passed and they told me I could look for one on my own and they would check into it.  I found about 10 and never got a reply from them.  They put around 3k miles on it.  And one day I went to pick it up and it had a broken side view mirror.  They said "Wow.  Didn't even notice that." and it took them nearly two months to fix it.  Save yourself the headache and do NOT do business with this dealership.  When we were sitting in the managers office one day, he told us about 6 vehicles that were seriously messed up, but they were still trying to sell them.

text:
My wife & I bought a Nissan Maxima, 2003 model, from the team at Hoover Southtown Motors.

We needed a car for our son just beginning to drive on his own. Since our son was a new driver, we were very particular about a safe, dependable car but we didn't want a lot of miles or to have to spend an arm & a leg. After looking at many dealerships & getting the "sales pitch", we came to Hoover Southtown. I wished I had come there first. Everyone there was friendly & made us feel at home as we took our time looking at vehicles on their lot. If we had a question they were there, but if we just wanted to look around they didn't bug us. Awesome guys! We took the car for a test drive & the car drove smooth like a dream! We still wanted to think about it overnight & the salesman was totally cool with it. It was great not to be pressured like you normally are at other dealerships. We returned the next morning to buy the car & had just a great experience.

Since April 2011, our son has put a lot of miles on the car going back & forth to school, basketball practices/games, workouts & now is about to start college.

So my advice is if you need a vehicle that won't cost you a fortune, low miles & reliable, make sure you visit Hoover Southtown Motors. I wish I had gone there first instead of wasting my time going anywhere else. Thanks.

text:
We do not doubt the integrity of the dealer or anyone there.  They seemed very likeable and down home.  We purchased a rare car at a premium price and due to title issues. we were not able to drive the car for a couple of weeks.  When we did, we had no idea that we would have to spend nearly $3000 more just to get the car drivable.  There was a fuel leak that prior owner probably tried to resolve and removed several design parts.  That may have masked the problem for a time.  It was obvious when we drove local and had to have dealer repair.

I recommend taking a close look at any car to be purchased and have it checked out thoroughly.  Again we liked everyone we met there... we just got stung badly on this vehicle.  The final cost of labor with discounted parts was >$3000 plus weeks of not having a driveable car....above purchase price.

Update:  Owner called and expressed he was sorry the car was missing some parts and required service for fuel leak remediation. Owner was very empathetic.

Caveat emptor...

I expected a little more attention to details.

resp.text: Mrs. Williams I apologize if you weren't happy with your clean up. I explain to customers that we can clean on one vehicle all day and still miss a spot or two... not making excuses, but it happens. I do not clean engines...I don't advertise that I clean engines. With all the electrical and computer components on these vehicles today, if water gets in one of those components it can cause major issues, the liability isn't worth the 10 minutes it takes to clean engines. Again... my apologies.

name: Edward Stratton
text:
Mr Darwin is an absolute professional at what he does. I brought my car in for him to clean up and he went way above and beyond what I expected of him.

I went for his best package, he calls it "luxury." And by all means it's not cheap at all, but I feel it was totally worth it.

Mr Darwin takes his time and you can tell he has an obsession for what he does. He was able to pull out stains I've had for years!!!!!

Tip the man, he doesn't disappoint!!!!!!!

Thank you Mr Darwin!!!!!

name: Steven Friedenberg
text: Did an excellent job at a reasonable price  I highly recommend and will use again.

name: Mobile Party Solutions
text: Darwin and his guys did an unbelievable job on my car that I had just bought and needed a serious detail job. You definitely get what you pay for here. He is all about attention to detail! If you want the job done right the first time don’t go any where else!

name: Ruth Finamore
text: Took my car for detail clean , wax, tires, the whole nine yards. When I went to pick it up I didn’t think it was the same car!!  Same day service. Super nice people. And the car was better than new.  Super clean upholstery and every square inch sparkled. Price was right, too. Far better and quicker than the dealership.  Highly recommend.

name: Robert Gibson
text: Had a great experience at Darwin Harris. Got the luxury package which includes a hand wax, carpet shampoo, leather clean and conditioner, and all the expected detail services. My SUV was spotless they even buffed out some light scratches for free. Also had a little dog hair (very little) and they just handled it. Gave a good price on headlight restoration.  So I brought it back the next day. A couple days later brought my wife's car in for the full works. Highly recommended.

text: I had my car cleaned today and they did such an amazing job!! My car has not looked like this since I drove it off the lot! Thanks guys!

name: Steve Butler
text: In my opinion, anyone on the eastern shore who is looking for a clean, sound, late model vehicle should first check with Darwin.  I cannot say enough about my recent, positive experience working with him.  Darwin made it painless to trade in my truck for a sedan.  He also secured excellent financing.  He is a person of honesty and character, and we are fortunate that he does business in our community.

name: James Ekelund
text: When it came time for my teenage daughter to go to college in a larger city some distance away, I wanted to make sure she had safe, dependable and economical transportation. I often passed the Darwin Harris automotive lot. Having done business with Darwin in prior years at a major Eastern Shore dealer, I had grown to know and TRUST Darwin's sincere approach to auto sales and service. BINGO! Darwin is succeeding on his own with the same level of credible and friendly service right in south Fairhope. I found the perfect college vehicle. My daughter drove it through college, married a young man who also thought it was a wise purchase. In fact, he even drove it himself after purchasing his wife a new vehicle in Birmingham. Kudos to Darwin Harris! Do yourself a favor and check out Darwin's fine selection of gently used vehicles, save $$$$$

text: Talked to my wife like she was stupid. Told her a price then when she arrived tried to double the price.

They're immediately told that pricing could changed depending on the condition of the vehicle... plus your wife declined to have the vehicle cleaned. I'm sorry if there was any confusion.

name: Ryan Martin
text:
New review:
I was back at the shop again, this time for a good bit of work (control arms and steering rack replacement) on my C230. They got it in and out quicker than I expected, and the work was millimeter perfect. I picked it up this afternoon, and spent two hours this evening joyriding around town because the car just felt that good.

They're truly a proper shop that will get your back on the road for pennies on the dollar as compared to a Mercedes dealer. Hard to ask for more.

Old review:
Thanks to Larry and the guys for getting my SLK 230 back up and running, and some $300 cheaper than their local competition! My old beast has 277,000 miles on it, so maybe with their help it will get to 300,000 and beyond.

They were transparent and thorough with every update, so I would definitely recommend them to anyone else for their import repair needs.

text: This is the worst place to go. I had engine check on in my car. Its valve cover gasket needed to be replaced.  Although I told them what the problem was, they kept the car for 3 weeks and asked for $250. The moment I turned the car on in their yard the engine check sign reappeared and this time it was flashing, which means there is a worse problem with the car. I HAD to get the keys back to them. This time, they kept the car for one more week and ask for extra $150. The guy in charge told me that there is also a problem with the coils. They didn't even bother turning on the car to see if any problems show up. If the coils had the problem from the beginning, they should have been able to diagnose it. In total, I paid $400. Two weeks later, the engine check came back again. I went there and he said you need to pay another $100 for diagnosis!! They just want to rip money off of you! Never go there!!!!

text: AVOID THIS PLACE AT ALL COSTS!!! Took my car for an oil change and brake check. Wanted to charge me over $100 for an oil change, so I had them nix it and just check the brakes. Came back and told me they would do the brakes and the oil for $450, which is absurdly overcharging. Told them no thanks. Owner had already told them to start the oil change and he'd charge me just for the oil and filter and the brake check. Whatever. Except they only put 5 qts of oil in the car which requires 5.5L, and used 5W30 instead of VW approved 5W40 like I specifically requested before turning over the keys initially. So not only did they try to overcharge me, they didn't even properly complete the work they did. The owner was sketchy throughout the whole deal. I had to repeatedly ask for quotes, which he never gave me solid estimates on, and I never felt like I could trust the work they did.

name: zmthornton
text:
These mechanics are very knowledgable and capable of tackling difficult/unique issues.

Patience and financial flexibility can play in with the overall experience because they are a small local shop. They aren't going to budge on price, but if you can be patient with them, they are good at being accommodating when issues arise. For instance, my 31 year old Land Cruiser FJ60 was brought to them to do an extensive AC overhaul. Their estimates seemed a bit on the high side, but again, they are very knowledgable and reasonable mechanics who want to "get it right the first time." They also never charged me for my truck occupying their space for over a week while waiting for parts to arrive, which was nice.

The "Ya get what ya pay for" adage plays in here, as they will help tackle tough issues and see them through til the end. Being a smaller shop that specializes in imports, there are going to be shops around that would do the same work for less money. However, chances are that you might not find the same level of knowledgable and thorough mechanic work.

text: Wonderful people!! Have shopped with them for several cars! Fixing to pay off a car we got from them. They have great warranty on the cars and they sell really good used cars. Love these people like family!

name: Amber Hart
text:
Let me tell you a story.  A story of buying a minivan.  Our car at the time had transmission issues and due to poor credit we came to The Driving Factor because of their decent ratings on Google. We bought a 2008 Chrysler Town and Country.  I rarely drove it as my car was being constantly fixed,  and only used it as a backup.  I owned this van for 3 months and didn't even put enough miles on it to get an oil change.  Then one night,  I wake up to the police pounding on my door at 2am. Why were they pounding,  you ask? Because the minivan in my driveway had burst into flames.  The reason? Shoddy electrical shorted out and caused a fire near the gas tank.

I lost valuable camera equipment and a vehicle I had a 375 a month payment on.  To top it off this happened around the time my cars transmission went completely.

We went to TDF. They informed us there was no warranty for the electrical system.  They would,  however,  "kindly" give us a loaner car to drive until the insurance finished their claim on the van.

The loaner was an old Impala that absolutely reeked of cigarette smoke and was constantly overheating and breaking down.  When my husband complained,  the older lady told him we should be thankful to have a loaner vehicle at all because that's not something they do.  They also wanted us to continue making the $375 a month payments on a minivan that was burnt to a crisp.

There were no apologies.  When the insurance claim was finished they said we still owed $2000 (they were making us pay all the interest on top of what the van cost) and in order to get another vehicle,  we would have to pay that $2000 on top of a down payment.  They literally sold us a POS and then wouldn't work with us at all.  Great business practice!

We took our business to High Country Toyota and got a minivan that lasted 3 years ( and a shorter loan of 18 months vs the 3.5 years Driving Factor had us roped into). I went back to High Country when that van needed to be replaced and bought myself a brand new Corolla.

Long story short,  don't go here,  ever.  Not only did I get sold a Lemon but I had to replace $5000 of camera equipment that was burned up inside the van, and this dealership did not care one bit.

name: jon carnley
text:
Were to start I first went to car mart in enterprise they told me I could get a car then after I was told to come in and do paper work but then when I got there and was told they could not help me so I went to langfords and talk to Janet I think that her name well let say in she told me no problem I could get the truck I picked out and I am happy about that and she was really nice and I will definitely tell people to go see them and got my payments were I needed them to be
I want to say THANK YOU

resp.text: Happy to welcome u to our family of customers... Thank you for the review..

name: JR Cambron
text:
I have dealt with Langford Quality Cars for about 23 years now. I have fond them to be very understanding when I was sick and had to have surgery, I let them know I could not afford to keep the truck I had they came and picked it up then when I got out of the hospital and was able to return to work they sold me another truck with no down payment.
Janet has always been understanding if people would call and let her know they were getting behind because of losing a job or some kind of illness. I have always known her to work with people if they gave here the respect of letting her know what was happening.
The people I hear talking bad about them are the ones who don't call and move. Or hide their cars then they get mad and badmouth her and the business.I have also noticed most of those people have a history of trying to keep from paying for what they buy from anyone and according to them it is always the business or the people that work there that cause the problem. But really it is just the customers going from place to place trying to beat businesses out of their merchandise without paying for it.

THANK YOU LANGFORD I HAVE ENJOYED OUR LONG ASSOCIATION. AND LOOK FORWARD TO MANY MORE YEARS.

resp.text: Thank you for the review!  Your loyal patronage over the years is appreciated so much!

resp.text: Thank you for the review.  We are happy to have ya'll in our family of customers!!

name: Ramiro Fernandez
text: Amazing service, picked up my junk car in one day. Everything went fine!! Very courteous and professional!! Thank you!!

name: Bianca S
text: The whole process was great! At first they gave me an offer that I didn’t want to accept so I let them know what I was trying to get so Ms Lashay went back and tried again and she was successful ! Even the driver Mr Earl was really nice !

name: Claire Wallace
text: I was impressed with how quick and easy it was to sell my old car to this company. I first put in a few lines of info online about my car and then had the option to phone them to complete the rest. They were friendly and in less than ten minutes I had an offer. The next morning, they came to get the car.

name: Jennifer Curry
text: Our contact with Robert over the phone was wonderful..  Very professional and polite... Answered all of our questions... All arrangements were completed quickly... Vehicles were picked up as expected... Payment was on the spot as promised...

name: Megan Holder
text: Calls were quick and easy. Service guy called and showed on time. Pick up was quick and easy. Would definitely give another call for future vehicle pick ups

name: Hel Adore
text: Sold my junk car through them, easy process and kind, helpful employees.

name: Mark Winchester
text: Very helpful and fast.

name: Andrew Anderson
text: Would recommend using these guys.

name: Lawrence Garcia
text: I made a mistake.  Hometown Motors is not affiliated with Wolfe Motors, German Motor works or enterprise euro works   They are not included  in any Ft Rucker Off Limits restrictions.  The owner contacted me and stated they have established a long standing and reputable business with Ft Rucker  He claims to have an excellent reputation in the Enterprise and Dothan areas.  I am very sorry for including Hometown motors in my  reviews.  I wish them success in the future.
